description: An illustration of a toy robot: its body is various shades of blue with red hexagonal claws for hands, red feet, red hexagonal eyes, a thin rectangular slot for a mouth, and an antenna sticking out of the left side of its head. On the robot's torso are a blue rectangle with a smaller red rectangle in the center in the top left, a red hexagon in the top right, and a series of red, blue, and white rectangles across the bottom.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
